subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The number of physical fouls that N.H.L. officials did not punish during the regular season may provide a clue to how closely they will uphold the rules in the Stanley Cup playoffs.
snippet: The number of physical fouls that N.H.L. officials did not punish during the regular season may provide a clue to how closely they will uphold the rules in the Stanley Cup playoffs.
